trans-unit.source: Selects a member from a list of candidates, and performs type conversion from actual argument type to formal argument type.
trans-unit.target: 從候選者清單中選取成員，並執行型別轉換，從實質引數 (Actual Argument) 型別轉換成型式引數 (Formal Argument) 型別。

trans-unit.source: Implementations of the <xref:System.Reflection.Binder> class are used by methods such as <xref:System.Type.InvokeMember%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, which selects from a set of possible members to execute, based on a set of parameter types and argument values; <xref:System.Type.GetMethod%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, which selects a method based on parameter types; and so on.
trans-unit.target: 實作<xref:System.Reflection.Binder>類別這類的方法使用<xref:System.Type.InvokeMember%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>，其中系統會從一組可能的成員來執行時，會根據一組參數型別和引數的值;<xref:System.Type.GetMethod%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>，其中系統會根據參數型別; 等等的方法。

trans-unit.source: A default implementation of the <xref:System.Reflection.Binder> class is provided by the <xref:System.Type.DefaultBinder%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 預設實作<xref:System.Reflection.Binder>類別由提供<xref:System.Type.DefaultBinder%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following example implements and demonstrates all members of the `Binder` class.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會實作，並示範的所有成員`Binder`類別。

trans-unit.source: The private method `CanConvertFrom` finds compatible types for a given type.
trans-unit.target: 私用方法`CanConvertFrom`尋找相容的類型指定型別。

trans-unit.source: When you inherit from <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Binder" />, you must override the following members: <see cref="M:System.Reflection.Binder.BindToMethod(System.Reflection.BindingFlags,System.Reflection.MethodBase[],System.Object[]@,System.Reflection.ParameterModifier[],System.Globalization.CultureInfo,System.String[],System.Object@)" />, <see cref="M:System.Reflection.Binder.BindToField(System.Reflection.BindingFlags,System.Reflection.FieldInfo[],System.Object,System.Globalization.CultureInfo)" />, <see cref="M:System.Reflection.Binder.ReorderArgumentArray(System.Object[]@,System.Object)" />, <see cref="M:System.Reflection.Binder.SelectMethod(System.Reflection.BindingFlags,System.Reflection.MethodBase[],System.Type[],System.Reflection.ParameterModifier[])" />, <see cref="M:System.Reflection.Binder.SelectProperty(System.Reflection.BindingFlags,System.Reflection.PropertyInfo[],System.Type,System.Type[],System.Reflection.ParameterModifier[])" />, and <see cref="M:System.Reflection.Binder.ChangeType(System.Object,System.Type,System.Globalization.CultureInfo)" />.
trans-unit.target: 當您繼承自<see cref="T:System.Reflection.Binder" />，您必須覆寫下列成員： <see cref="M:System.Reflection.Binder.BindToMethod(System.Reflection.BindingFlags,System.Reflection.MethodBase[],System.Object[]@,System.Reflection.ParameterModifier[],System.Globalization.CultureInfo,System.String[],System.Object@)" />， <see cref="M:System.Reflection.Binder.BindToField(System.Reflection.BindingFlags,System.Reflection.FieldInfo[],System.Object,System.Globalization.CultureInfo)" />， <see cref="M:System.Reflection.Binder.ReorderArgumentArray(System.Object[]@,System.Object)" />， <see cref="M:System.Reflection.Binder.SelectMethod(System.Reflection.BindingFlags,System.Reflection.MethodBase[],System.Type[],System.Reflection.ParameterModifier[])" />， <see cref="M:System.Reflection.Binder.SelectProperty(System.Reflection.BindingFlags,System.Reflection.PropertyInfo[],System.Type,System.Type[],System.Reflection.ParameterModifier[])" />，和<see cref="M:System.Reflection.Binder.ChangeType(System.Object,System.Type,System.Globalization.CultureInfo)" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Binder" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Binder" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called by the constructors of derived classes, to initialize state in this type.
trans-unit.target: 衍生的類別，以初始化狀態，這種類型的建構函式會呼叫這個建構函式。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> 值的位元組合。

trans-unit.source: The set of fields that are candidates for matching.
trans-unit.target: 可能相符的欄位集合。

trans-unit.source: For example, when a <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Binder" /> object is used by <see cref="Overload:System.Type.InvokeMember" />, this parameter specifies the set of fields that reflection has determined to be possible matches, typically because they have the correct member name.
trans-unit.target: 例如，當 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Binder" /> 使用 <see cref="Overload:System.Type.InvokeMember" /> 物件時，這個參數就會指定已由反映判定為可能相符的欄位集合，通常是因為這些欄位具有正確的成員名稱。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation provided by <see cref="P:System.Type.DefaultBinder" /> changes the order of this array.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Type.DefaultBinder" /> 所提供的預設實作會變更此陣列的順序。

trans-unit.source: The field value used to locate a matching field.
trans-unit.target: 用來找出相符欄位的欄位值。

trans-unit.source: An instance of <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> that is used to control the coercion of data types, in binder implementations that coerce types.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> 的執行個體 (Instance)，用來控制強制型轉型別的繫結器 (Binder) 實作中資料型別的強制型轉 (Coercion)。

trans-unit.source: If <c>culture</c> is <see langword="null" />, the <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> for the current thread is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果「文化特性 (Culture)」<c></c>是 <see langword="null" />，則使用目前執行緒的 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" />。

trans-unit.source: Note For example, if a binder implementation allows coercion of string values to numeric types, this parameter is necessary to convert a <see langword="String" /> that represents 1000 to a <see langword="Double" /> value, because 1000 is represented differently by different cultures.
trans-unit.target: 注意：例如，如果繫結器實作允許您將字串值強制型轉為數值，則將表示 1000 的 <see langword="String" /> 轉換成 <see langword="Double" /> 值時必須使用這個參數，因為 1000 在不同的文化特性中有不同的表示方式。

trans-unit.source: The default binder does not do such string coercions.
trans-unit.target: 預設的繫結器不會處理這種字串強制型轉。

trans-unit.source: Selects a field from the given set of fields, based on the specified criteria.
trans-unit.target: 根據指定的條件，從一組指定的欄位中選取欄位。

trans-unit.source: The matching field.
trans-unit.target: 符合的欄位。

trans-unit.source: If `bindingAttr` does not include <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.SetField?displayProperty=nameWithType>, the default binder implementation provided by <xref:System.Type.DefaultBinder%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> simply returns the first element of `match`.
trans-unit.target: 如果`bindingAttr`不包含<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.SetField?displayProperty=nameWithType>，所提供的預設繫結器實作<xref:System.Type.DefaultBinder%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>只會傳回第一個項目`match`。

trans-unit.source: No selection is done.
trans-unit.target: 沒有選取項目是完成。

trans-unit.source: This method controls the binding provided by <xref:System.Type.InvokeMember%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法所提供的繫結的控制項<xref:System.Type.InvokeMember%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: For the default binder, <paramref name="bindingAttr" /> includes <see cref="F:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.SetField" />, and <paramref name="match" /> contains multiple fields that are equally good matches for <paramref name="value" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果是預設繫結器，<paramref name="bindingAttr" /> 將包括 <see cref="F:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.SetField" />，而 <paramref name="match" /> 則包含同樣都與 <paramref name="value" /> 相符的多個欄位。

trans-unit.source: For example, <paramref name="value" /> contains a <c>MyClass</c> object that implements the <c>IMyClass</c> interface, and <paramref name="match" /> contains a field of type <c>MyClass</c> and a field of type <c>IMyClass</c>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<paramref name="value" /> 包含的 <c>MyClass</c> 物件會執行 <c>IMyClass</c> 介面，而 <paramref name="match" /> 包含 <c>MyClass</c> 類型的欄位和 <c>IMyClass</c> 類型的欄位。

trans-unit.source: For the default binder, <paramref name="bindingAttr" /> includes <see cref="F:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.SetField" />, and <paramref name="match" /> contains no fields that can accept <paramref name="value" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果是預設繫結器，<paramref name="bindingAttr" /> 將包括 <see cref="F:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.SetField" />，而 <paramref name="match" /> 則不會包含可以接受 <paramref name="value" /> 的欄位。

trans-unit.source: For the default binder, <paramref name="bindingAttr" /> includes <see cref="F:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.SetField" />, and <paramref name="match" /> is <see langword="null" /> or an empty array.
trans-unit.target: 如果是預設繫結器，<paramref name="bindingAttr" /> 將包括 <see cref="F:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.SetField" />，而 <paramref name="match" /> 則會是 <see langword="null" /> 或空白陣列。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="bindingAttr" /> includes <see cref="F:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.SetField" />, and <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="bindingAttr" /> 將包括 <see cref="F:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.SetField" />，而 <paramref name="value" /> 則會是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> 值的位元組合。

trans-unit.source: The set of methods that are candidates for matching.
trans-unit.target: 可能相符的方法集合。

trans-unit.source: For example, when a <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Binder" /> object is used by <see cref="Overload:System.Type.InvokeMember" />, this parameter specifies the set of methods that reflection has determined to be possible matches, typically because they have the correct member name.
trans-unit.target: 例如，當 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Binder" /> 使用 <see cref="Overload:System.Type.InvokeMember" /> 物件時，這個參數就會指定已由反映判定為可能相符的方法集合，通常是因為這些方法具有正確的成員名稱。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation provided by <see cref="P:System.Type.DefaultBinder" /> changes the order of this array.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Type.DefaultBinder" /> 所提供的預設實作會變更此陣列的順序。

trans-unit.source: The arguments that are passed in.
trans-unit.target: 傳入的引數。

trans-unit.source: The binder can change the order of the arguments in this array; for example, the default binder changes the order of arguments if the <c>names</c> parameter is used to specify an order other than positional order.
trans-unit.target: 繫結器可能會變更此陣列中的引數順序；例如，如果使用 <c>names</c> 參數來指定位置順序以外的其他順序，預設繫結器就會變更引數的順序。

trans-unit.source: If a binder implementation coerces argument types, the types and values of the arguments can be changed as well.
trans-unit.target: 如果繫結器實作強制型轉了引數型別 (Argument Type)，引數的型別和值也可能會變更。

trans-unit.source: An array of parameter modifiers that enable binding to work with parameter signatures in which the types have been modified.
trans-unit.target: 參數修飾詞的陣列，啟用繫結以使用型別已被修改的參數簽章。

trans-unit.source: The default binder implementation does not use this parameter.
trans-unit.target: 預設繫結器實作時並不會使用這個參數。

trans-unit.source: An instance of <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> that is used to control the coercion of data types, in binder implementations that coerce types.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> 的執行個體 (Instance)，用來控制強制型轉型別的繫結器 (Binder) 實作中資料型別的強制型轉 (Coercion)。

trans-unit.source: If <c>culture</c> is <see langword="null" />, the <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> for the current thread is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果「文化特性 (Culture)」<c></c>是 <see langword="null" />，則使用目前執行緒的 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" />。

trans-unit.source: Note For example, if a binder implementation allows coercion of string values to numeric types, this parameter is necessary to convert a <see langword="String" /> that represents 1000 to a <see langword="Double" /> value, because 1000 is represented differently by different cultures.
trans-unit.target: 注意：例如，如果繫結器實作允許您將字串值強制型轉為數值，則將表示 1000 的 <see langword="String" /> 轉換成 <see langword="Double" /> 值時必須使用這個參數，因為 1000 在不同的文化特性中有不同的表示方式。

trans-unit.source: The default binder does not do such string coercions.
trans-unit.target: 預設的繫結器不會處理這種字串強制型轉。

trans-unit.source: The parameter names, if parameter names are to be considered when matching, or <see langword="null" /> if arguments are to be treated as purely positional.
trans-unit.target: 如果比對時必須考慮參數名稱，便為參數名稱；如果只將引數視為單純的位置引數，則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: For example, parameter names must be used if arguments are not supplied in positional order.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果位置順序中並未提供引數，您就必須使用參數名稱。

trans-unit.source: After the method returns, <c>state</c> contains a binder-provided object that keeps track of argument reordering.
trans-unit.target: 在此方法傳回之後，<c>state</c> 就會包含繫結器提供的物件，用以記錄引數重新調整順序。

trans-unit.source: The binder creates this object, and the binder is the sole consumer of this object.
trans-unit.target: 繫結器會建立這個物件，而且也是這個物件的唯一使用者。

trans-unit.source: If <c>state</c> is not <see langword="null" /> when <see langword="BindToMethod" /> returns, you must pass <c>state</c> to the <see cref="M:System.Reflection.Binder.ReorderArgumentArray(System.Object[]@,System.Object)" /> method if you want to restore <c>args</c> to its original order, for example, so that you can retrieve the values of <see langword="ref" /> parameters (<see langword="ByRef" /> parameters in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see langword="BindToMethod" /> 傳回時，<c>state</c> 不是 <see langword="null" />，而且您想要將 <c>args</c> 還原成原來的順序，使您可以擷取 <see langword="ref" /> 參數 (在 Visual Basic 中為 <see langword="ByRef" /> 參數) 的值，就必須將 <c>state</c> 傳遞至 <see cref="M:System.Reflection.Binder.ReorderArgumentArray(System.Object[]@,System.Object)" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: Selects a method to invoke from the given set of methods, based on the supplied arguments.
trans-unit.target: 根據提供的引數，從一組指定的方法中選取要叫用 (Invoke) 的方法。

trans-unit.source: The matching method.
trans-unit.target: 符合的方法。

trans-unit.source: The default binder takes into account both parameters that have values and `params` arrays (`ParamArray` arrays in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 會考量這兩個參數具有值的預設繫結器和`params`陣列 (`ParamArray` Visual Basic 中的陣列)。

trans-unit.source: Thus, it is possible to find a match in cases where `args` and `match` do not contain the same number of elements.
trans-unit.target: 因此，很可能在案例中尋找相符項目位置`args`和`match`不包含相同數目的項目。

trans-unit.source: The binder enables a client to map the array of arguments back to its original form if the argument array has been manipulated by <xref:System.Reflection.Binder.BindToMethod%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 繫結器可讓用戶端對應回其原始形式的引數陣列，如果引數陣列具有操作的<xref:System.Reflection.Binder.BindToMethod%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Use this remap capability to get back by-reference arguments when such arguments are present.
trans-unit.target: 使用此重新對應功能，所參考的引數這類引數都出現時取得。

trans-unit.source: When you pass arguments by name, the binder reorders the argument array.
trans-unit.target: 當您依名稱傳遞引數時，繫結器重新排列引數陣列。

trans-unit.source: The `state` parameter keeps track of argument reordering, thus enabling the binder's <xref:System.Reflection.Binder.ReorderArgumentArray%2A> method to reorder the argument array to its original form.
trans-unit.target: `state`會追蹤參數的引數重新調整順序，因此可以讓繫結器的<xref:System.Reflection.Binder.ReorderArgumentArray%2A>方法來重新排列成其原始形式的引數陣列。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.Binder.BindToMethod%2A> method is used by the <xref:System.Type.InvokeMember%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.Binder.BindToMethod%2A>方法由<xref:System.Type.InvokeMember%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: For the default binder, <paramref name="match" /> contains multiple methods that are equally good matches for <paramref name="args" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果是預設繫結器，<paramref name="match" /> 將包含同樣都與 <paramref name="args" /> 相符的多個方法。

trans-unit.source: For example, <paramref name="args" /> contains a <c>MyClass</c> object that implements the <c>IMyClass</c> interface, and <paramref name="match" /> contains a method that takes <c>MyClass</c> and a method that takes <c>IMyClass</c>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<paramref name="args" /> 包含的 <c>MyClass</c> 物件會實作 <c>IMyClass</c> 介面，而 <paramref name="match" /> 則包含採用 <c>MyClass</c> 的方法及採用 <c>IMyClass</c> 的方法。

trans-unit.source: For the default binder, <paramref name="match" /> contains no methods that can accept the arguments supplied in <paramref name="args" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果是預設繫結器，<paramref name="match" /> 不會包含可以接受 <paramref name="args" /> 中提供之引數的方法。

trans-unit.source: For the default binder, <paramref name="match" /> is <see langword="null" /> or an empty array.
trans-unit.target: 如果是預設繫結器 (Binder)，<paramref name="match" /> 會是 <see langword="null" /> 或空白陣列。

trans-unit.source: The object to change into a new <see langword="Type" />.
trans-unit.target: 要變更為新 <see langword="Type" /> 的物件。

trans-unit.source: The new <see langword="Type" /> that <c>value</c> will become.
trans-unit.target: 「值」<c></c>將要變成的新 <see langword="Type" />。

trans-unit.source: An instance of <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> that is used to control the coercion of data types.
trans-unit.target: 用來控制資料型別之強制型轉的 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: If <c>culture</c> is <see langword="null" />, the <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> for the current thread is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果「文化特性 (Culture)」<c></c>是 <see langword="null" />，則使用目前執行緒的 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" />。

trans-unit.source: Note For example, this parameter is necessary to convert a <see langword="String" /> that represents 1000 to a <see langword="Double" /> value, because 1000 is represented differently by different cultures.
trans-unit.target: 注意：例如，將表示 1000 的 <see langword="String" /> 轉換為 <see langword="Double" /> 值時必須使用這個參數，因為 1000 在不同文化特性中有不同的表示方式。

trans-unit.source: Changes the type of the given <see langword="Object" /> to the given <see langword="Type" />.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的 <see langword="Object" /> 型別變更為指定的 <see langword="Type" />。

trans-unit.source: An object that contains the given value as the new type.
trans-unit.target: 物件，含有做為新型別的指定值。

trans-unit.source: Reflection models the accessibility rules of the common type system.
trans-unit.target: 反映模型一般類型系統的存取範圍的規則。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the caller is in the same assembly, the caller does not need special permissions for internal members.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果呼叫端在相同的組件，呼叫端不需要特殊權限的內部成員。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the caller needs <xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission>.
trans-unit.target: 否則，呼叫端需要<xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission>。

trans-unit.source: This is consistent with lookup of members that are protected, private, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 這是一致的受保護的成員查閱、 private、 等等。

trans-unit.source: The general principle is that `ChangeType` should perform only widening coercions, which never lose data.
trans-unit.target: 一般原則是`ChangeType`應該執行僅擴展強制型轉，永遠不會遺失資料。

trans-unit.source: An example of a widening coercion is coercing a value that is a 32-bit signed integer to a value that is a 64-bit signed integer.
trans-unit.target: 擴展強制型轉的範例強制為 64 位元帶正負號的整數值的 32 位元帶正負號的整數的值。

trans-unit.source: This is distinguished from a narrowing coercion, which may lose data.
trans-unit.target: 這被區分縮小強制，可能會遺失資料。

trans-unit.source: An example of a narrowing coercion is coercing a 64-bit signed integer to a 32-bit signed integer.
trans-unit.target: 縮小強制型轉的範例強制 64 位元帶正負號的整數，32 位元帶正負號的整數。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the coercions performed by the default `ChangeType`.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出由預設的強制型轉`ChangeType`。

trans-unit.source: Source type
trans-unit.target: 來源類型

trans-unit.source: Target type
trans-unit.target: 目標類型

trans-unit.source: Any type
trans-unit.target: 任何型別

trans-unit.source: Its base type.
trans-unit.target: 其基底類型。

trans-unit.source: Any type
trans-unit.target: 任何型別

trans-unit.source: The interface it implements.
trans-unit.target: 它所實作的介面。

trans-unit.source: Char
trans-unit.target: Char

trans-unit.source: UInt16, UInt32, Int32, UInt64, Int64, Single, Double
trans-unit.target: UInt16、UInt32、Int32、UInt64、Int64、Single、Double

trans-unit.source: Byte
trans-unit.target: Byte

trans-unit.source: Char, UInt16, Int16, UInt32, Int32, UInt64, Int64, Single, Double
trans-unit.target: Char、UInt16、Int16、UInt32、Int32、UInt64、Int64、Single、Double

trans-unit.source: SByte
trans-unit.target: SByte

trans-unit.target: Int16、Int32、Int64、Single、Double

trans-unit.target: UInt16

trans-unit.target: UInt32、Int32、UInt64、Int64、Single、Double

trans-unit.target: Int16

trans-unit.target: Int32、Int64、Single、Double

trans-unit.target: UInt32

trans-unit.target: Int32

trans-unit.target: Int64、Single、Double

trans-unit.target: UInt64

trans-unit.source: Single, Double
trans-unit.target: Single、Double

trans-unit.source: Int64
trans-unit.target: Int64

trans-unit.source: Single, Double
trans-unit.target: Single、Double

trans-unit.source: Single
trans-unit.target: Single

trans-unit.source: Double
trans-unit.target: Double

trans-unit.source: Non-reference
trans-unit.target: 非參考

trans-unit.source: By-reference.
trans-unit.target: 所參考。

trans-unit.source: The actual arguments that are passed in.
trans-unit.target: 傳入的實質引數。

trans-unit.source: Both the types and values of the arguments can be changed.
trans-unit.target: 引數的型別和值都可以被變更。

trans-unit.source: A binder-provided object that keeps track of argument reordering.
trans-unit.target: 繫結器提供的物件，記錄引數重新調整順序。

trans-unit.source: Upon returning from <see cref="M:System.Reflection.Binder.BindToMethod(System.Reflection.BindingFlags,System.Reflection.MethodBase[],System.Object[]@,System.Reflection.ParameterModifier[],System.Globalization.CultureInfo,System.String[],System.Object@)" />, restores the <paramref name="args" /> argument to what it was when it came from <see langword="BindToMethod" />.
trans-unit.target: 在從 <see cref="M:System.Reflection.Binder.BindToMethod(System.Reflection.BindingFlags,System.Reflection.MethodBase[],System.Object[]@,System.Reflection.ParameterModifier[],System.Globalization.CultureInfo,System.String[],System.Object@)" /> 傳回時，當 <paramref name="args" /> 引數來自 <see langword="BindToMethod" /> 時，將還原為本來的狀態。

trans-unit.source: The common language runtime calls this method if `state` is not `null` after a return from `BindToMethod`.
trans-unit.target: Common language runtime 會呼叫這個方法，如果`state`不`null`之後從傳回`BindToMethod`。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> 值的位元組合。

trans-unit.source: The set of methods that are candidates for matching.
trans-unit.target: 可能相符的方法集合。

trans-unit.source: For example, when a <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Binder" /> object is used by <see cref="Overload:System.Type.InvokeMember" />, this parameter specifies the set of methods that reflection has determined to be possible matches, typically because they have the correct member name.
trans-unit.target: 例如，當 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Binder" /> 使用 <see cref="Overload:System.Type.InvokeMember" /> 物件時，這個參數就會指定已由反映判定為可能相符的方法集合，通常是因為這些方法具有正確的成員名稱。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation provided by <see cref="P:System.Type.DefaultBinder" /> changes the order of this array.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Type.DefaultBinder" /> 所提供的預設實作會變更此陣列的順序。

trans-unit.source: The parameter types used to locate a matching method.
trans-unit.target: 用來找出相符方法的參數型別。

trans-unit.source: An array of parameter modifiers that enable binding to work with parameter signatures in which the types have been modified.
trans-unit.target: 參數修飾詞的陣列，啟用繫結以使用型別已被修改的參數簽章。

trans-unit.source: Selects a method from the given set of methods, based on the argument type.
trans-unit.target: 根據引數型別，從一組指定的方法中選取方法。

trans-unit.source: The matching method, if found; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 符合的方法，如果找到的話，否則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: This method should return `null` if no method matches the criteria.
trans-unit.target: 此方法應傳回`null`如果不符合準則的任何方法。

trans-unit.source: This method controls the selection provided by the `GetConstructor` and `GetMethod` methods on `Type`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會控制所提供的選取項目`GetConstructor`和`GetMethod`方法`Type`。

trans-unit.source: For the default binder, <paramref name="match" /> contains multiple methods that are equally good matches for the parameter types described by <paramref name="types" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果是預設繫結器，<paramref name="match" /> 將包含同樣都與 <paramref name="types" /> 所描述之參數型別相符的多個方法。

trans-unit.source: For example, the array in <paramref name="types" /> contains a <see cref="T:System.Type" /> object for <c>MyClass</c> and the array in <paramref name="match" /> contains a method that takes a base class of <c>MyClass</c> and a method that takes an interface that <c>MyClass</c> implements.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<paramref name="types" /> 中的陣列會包含 <c>MyClass</c> 的 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 物件，而 <paramref name="match" /> 中的陣列則包含可取得 <c>MyClass</c> 之基底類別的方法，以及可取得 <c>MyClass</c> 所實作之介面的方法。

trans-unit.source: For the default binder, <paramref name="match" /> is <see langword="null" /> or an empty array.
trans-unit.target: 如果是預設繫結器 (Binder)，<paramref name="match" /> 會是 <see langword="null" /> 或空白陣列。

trans-unit.source: -or-
An element of <paramref name="types" /> derives from <see cref="T:System.Type" />, but is not of type <see langword="RuntimeType" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="types" /> 的一個項目衍生自 <see cref="T:System.Type" />，但不是 <see langword="RuntimeType" /> 型別。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> 值的位元組合。

trans-unit.source: The set of properties that are candidates for matching.
trans-unit.target: 可能相符的屬性集合。

trans-unit.source: For example, when a <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Binder" /> object is used by <see cref="Overload:System.Type.InvokeMember" />, this parameter specifies the set of properties that reflection has determined to be possible matches, typically because they have the correct member name.
trans-unit.target: 例如，當 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Binder" /> 使用 <see cref="Overload:System.Type.InvokeMember" /> 物件時，這個參數就會指定已由反映判定為可能相符的屬性集合，通常是因為這些屬性具有正確的成員名稱。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation provided by <see cref="P:System.Type.DefaultBinder" /> changes the order of this array.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Type.DefaultBinder" /> 所提供的預設實作會變更此陣列的順序。

trans-unit.source: The return value the matching property must have.
trans-unit.target: 相符屬性必須有的傳回值。

trans-unit.source: The index types of the property being searched for.
trans-unit.target: 要被搜尋的索引屬性型別。

trans-unit.source: Used for index properties such as the indexer for a class.
trans-unit.target: 用於索引屬性，像是類別的索引子。

trans-unit.source: An array of parameter modifiers that enable binding to work with parameter signatures in which the types have been modified.
trans-unit.target: 參數修飾詞的陣列，啟用繫結以使用型別已被修改的參數簽章。

trans-unit.source: Selects a property from the given set of properties, based on the specified criteria.
trans-unit.target: 根據指定的條件，從一組指定的屬性中選取屬性。

trans-unit.source: The matching property.
trans-unit.target: 符合的屬性。

trans-unit.source: This method controls the selection provided by the `GetProperty` method on `Type`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會控制所提供的選取項目`GetProperty`方法`Type`。

trans-unit.source: For the default binder, <paramref name="match" /> contains multiple properties that are equally good matches for <paramref name="returnType" /> and <paramref name="indexes" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果是預設繫結器，<paramref name="match" /> 將包含同樣都與 <paramref name="returnType" /> 和 <paramref name="indexes" /> 相符的多個屬性。

trans-unit.source: For the default binder, <paramref name="match" /> is <see langword="null" /> or an empty array.
trans-unit.target: 如果是預設繫結器 (Binder)，<paramref name="match" /> 會是 <see langword="null" /> 或空白陣列。
